original_text: I have become like the jackals and the ostriches. My sad voice sounds like them. I have become like the jackals and the ostriches. My sad voice sounds like them. My sad voice sounds like them
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 슬픈 목소리가 그들과 같이 들린다
